properties.name: color
properties.parameters: [["Selection Type","Value","free","Determines whether the use must choose from a palette ('fixed') or can choose an arbitrary color ('free')."],["Options","List","","List of selectable colors."]]
properties.examples:
Color = color

Palette = color fixed (F00: Red, #0F0: Green, #00F: Blue)
properties.storage: Colors are stored as RGB hex values including '#'.
